Title: Warrior Priest
Intro: A Warrior Priest is armed with one of the following weapon options: Sigmarite Warhammer and Sigmarite Shield; Paired Sigmarite Warhammers; or Sigmarite Greathammer.

Rules.Name: Shield
Rules.Rule: SHIELD: If this unit is armed with a Sigmarite Shield, it has a Save characteristic of 3+ instead of 4+.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit can be mounted on a Barded Warhorse that is armed with Steel-shod Hooves. If this unit is mounted on a Barded Warhorse, it has a Move characteristic of 12" instead of 5".
